courses.title: Beginner Guitar Lessons
courses.description: Learn the basics of playing guitar, including chords, strumming, and simple songs.

courses.title: Advanced Piano Techniques
courses.description: Master advanced piano techniques and learn to play complex pieces with confidence.

courses.title: Music Theory Essentials
courses.description: Understand the fundamentals of music theory, including scales, chords, and harmony.

courses.title: Vocal Training for Beginners
courses.description: Develop your vocal skills and learn techniques to improve your singing voice.

courses.title: Drumming Fundamentals
courses.description: Get started with drumming by learning the basic rhythms and techniques.
